item.description:
Our February 8, 2010 speaker will be Jim Ugone, seasoned entrepreneur and expert horticulturalist, founder and president of U CAN Brand LLC www.theucanbrand.com. Jim has created and commercialized an all-in-one watering can that simplifies watering and fertilizing. He will share his experiences launching this new product.

Arrive as early as 6:30 to network with others. The meeting starts promptly at 7:00. A map of MIT showing the meeting location is at http://whereis.mit.ed.... Street parking is suggested on Ames Street, Vassar Street or Memorial Drive. Most MIT buildings have easy access and are interconnected.
item.name: Inventors Association of New England February Meetup
